subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: Autism Awareness, a $1,000 yearling who won last week’s El Camino Real Derby as a 62-to-1 underdog, has a knee injury that will keep him out of contention for the Kentucky Derby. The trainer Genaro Vallejo found a bone chip in Autism Awareness’s left front knee. The colt will have on operation Friday at Golden Gate Fields.
